text: Schizoptera is a plant genus in the sunflower family.Turczaninow, Nicolai Stepanowitsch. 1851. Bulletin de la Société Impériale des Naturalistes de Moscou 24(1): 181-182 in LatinTropicos, Schizoptera trichotoma Turcz. ;Species There is only one accepted species, Schizoptera peduncularis, native to Peru and Ecuador. ==References== Category:Monotypic Asteraceae genera Category:Heliantheae Category:Flora of South America Category:Taxa named by Nikolai Turczaninow Category:Plants described in 1851
title: Schizoptera
